name: biomni-query-scholar
title: Biomni: Query Scholar
description: Search Google Scholar for papers based on the provided query. Returns the first search result with title, year, venue, and abstract.
content:
Overview

Search Google Scholar for academic papers and scholarly literature based on your query. Google Scholar indexes scholarly articles across all disciplines and sources including peer-reviewed papers, theses, books, abstracts, and court opinions from academic publishers, professional societies, universities, and other scholarly organizations.

Input Parameters

  • query (required): Search query string for scholarly literature

Input Format

{
  "query": "machine learning drug discovery"
}

Biological Use Case

Ideal for broad academic literature searches across multiple disciplines related to life sciences. Use cases include: finding highly cited papers in a research area, discovering cross-disciplinary research connections, locating papers not indexed in PubMed, finding theses and dissertations, identifying review articles and book chapters, tracking citations and research impact, and accessing grey literature and conference proceedings. Google Scholar's comprehensive indexing makes it valuable for interdisciplinary research combining biology with chemistry, physics, computer science, or engineering.

Output

Returns a text file (scholar_results.txt) containing the first search result with detailed information including title, authors, publication year, venue/journal, abstract, citation count, and link to the paper. Results prioritize highly cited and relevant papers.

Category

literature
